content: 5yd of one colour of yarn remain or cowl has reached desired height break other yarn leaving 20cm 8in tail for weaving in if using mc to bind off *k2tog p1* to end if using cc to bind off *k1 p2tog* to end using larger needle bind off loosely weave in ends and wet block to size try not to stretch the fabric out gently smooth it into place thanks so much for knitting my pattern please visit www emmaknits net for more all text and images © emma galati 2015 not for resale or reproduction you are free to do whatever you like with your finished object but please credit me as the designer should you choose to sell it �2
